project.title: 365 Days of Light and Dark
project.description: A song a day. 365 days. One year of sonic exploration through the spectrum of light and dark.

announcements.title: The Journey Begins
announcements.content: 365 days. 365 songs. No breaks. No excuses. Let's go.

monthThemes.name: January
monthThemes.description: Fresh starts, hope, and the excitement of a new journey

monthThemes.name: February
monthThemes.description: Bonds, relationships, and the warmth of human connection

monthThemes.name: March
monthThemes.description: Personal evolution, learning, and stepping into potential

monthThemes.name: April
monthThemes.description: Looking back, bittersweet memories, and emotional depth

monthThemes.name: May
monthThemes.description: Overcoming obstacles, inner power, and determination

monthThemes.name: June
monthThemes.description: Facing reality, uncomfortable truths, and necessary change

monthThemes.name: July
monthThemes.description: Confronting the void, exploring pain, and raw honesty

monthThemes.name: August
monthThemes.description: Rock bottom, processing trauma, and beginning to heal

monthThemes.name: September
monthThemes.description: Processing pain, letting go, finding peace with the past

monthThemes.name: October
monthThemes.description: Rising from the ashes, transformation, new perspective

monthThemes.name: December
monthThemes.description: Joy, triumph, looking forward, completing the cycle
